question: What resources are available for learning about remote development on clusters with VSCode?
answer: There is a SHARCNET General Interest Webinar titled "Remote Development on Clusters with VSCode" presented by Armin Sobhani (Part I and Part II), and a tutorial video created by two users titled "Connect VS Code to High-Performance Computing (HPC) Clusters".

question: Who presented the SHARCNET General Interest Webinar on "Remote Development on Clusters with VSCode"?
answer: The webinar was presented by Armin Sobhani.

question: Where can I find Part I of the SHARCNET webinar on remote development with VSCode?
answer: Part I of the webinar is available at: https://youtu.be/u9k6HikDyqk.

question: Where can I find Part II of the SHARCNET webinar on remote development with VSCode?
answer: Part II of the webinar is available at: https://youtu.be/CsgBGpampvc.

question: Is there a tutorial video for connecting VS Code to High-Performance Computing (HPC) Clusters?
answer: Yes, there is a tutorial video titled "Connect VS Code to High-Performance Computing (HPC) Clusters" available at https://youtu.be/1B0hiWaVcHY.

question: What is the recommended viewing quality for the tutorial video on connecting VS Code to HPC Clusters?
answer: The tutorial video is best viewed in 720p.
